application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed pole and supporting cabinets, due to their height, siting, appearance and mass, would cause visual clutter and would be dominant and discordant in the streetscene would therefore cause harm to the character and appearance of the wider streetscene.  The proposal is therefore contrary to policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016), D1, D4 and D8 of the London Plan (2021), policiesCS8 and CS15 of the Core Strategy 2011, policies DM2.1, DM2.7 and DM6.5 of the Development Management Policies 2013, and the guidance contained within the Urban Design Guide 2017.
description: Application for Prior Approval Notification of proposed ground based telecommunications installation including 1 no. 20m phase 8 street pole of with GPS Module at top pole and H3G Antennas; 1 no. HG3 CommScope batsman equipment cabinet, 1 no. H3G Huawei APM5930 equipment cabinet, 1 no. HG3 wrap-around cabinet built around base of proposed street pole and 1 no. H3G CommScope bowler cabinet with ancillary works.
